Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team. I wish him well in his new endeavors, said Steve Ballmer . when Andy Coulson was editor of the News of the World newspaper. Andy Coulson , who has denied wrongdoing, resigned as Prime Minister David Cameron 's communications chief last week after repeated questions about practices at the newspaper. "Trust in politics' However, Labour said David Cameron could not escape responsibility for bringing Mr Andy Coulson into his top team when there were unresolved questions about his past. I think that David Cameron was wrong to appoint someone to the heart of the government, to the heart of Downing Street, who had actually been editor of a newspaper at a time when criminal activity was going on, Ms Harriet Harman said. While acknowledging that Mr Andy Coulson had denied any involvement in phone hacking, she added the issue risked further eroding public confidence in politics.
